value.name: UCP government wants a business case for Calgary's Green Line
value.description: Last July, city council voted to revise the alignment for the first stage of the Green Line. That resulted in a shorter downtown tunnel which is expected to keep the project on budget; it also results in a shallower tunnel which helps control costs.
